hero.title: Reliable construction for government and non-residential buildings
hero.desc: REMSTROY company carries out construction and installation work based on government orders.

standard.title: Full Compliance with Standards
standard.desc: REMSTROY strictly follows all national and international construction standards.

quality.title: High Quality Guarantee
quality.desc: Each project is carried out under continuous quality control.

tech.title: Modern Technologies
tech.desc: Advanced and efficient construction technologies are used.

about.label: ABOUT COMPANY
about.title: Reliability and Professionalism in Construction
about.text: REMSTROY is a construction company founded in 2007, implementing road and industrial infrastructure projects. With modern equipment and qualified specialists, all work is completed with high quality and on time.
about.textNested1: Main activities include construction of main pipelines, metal structure installation, capital renovation, and road construction.
about.textNested2: The company strictly complies with construction regulations and quality standards.

card1.title: We have experienced engineers.
card1.text: Our specialists are highly qualified and perform each project with quality.

card2.title: 24/7 customer support.
card2.text: We are always ready to help our clients and provide prompt services.

card3.title: Talented team members.
card3.text: Our team consists of professional and responsible employees.

believe.title: We Believe in the Power of Big Ideas
believe.desc: Since 2007, our company has been successfully operating in road construction, main pipeline installation, and industrial facility development. With modern equipment and an experienced team, we ensure high-quality project execution within agreed deadlines.
believe.check2: Main pipeline and industrial facility construction
believe.check3: Manufacturing and installation of metal structures
believe.check4: Modern heavy equipment and highly qualified specialists
believe.check5: Experience working in challenging climate conditions

stats.title: We do big things with big ideas.

cta.title: Ready To Get Started?
cta.text: Here you can start any project. All the necessary resources and opportunities are ready.

1.title: Compliance with State Standards
1.desc: All work is carried out in accordance with current regulations. All required licenses are available. Equipment complies with Euro-3 standards.

2.title: Experienced Specialists
2.desc: Qualified engineers and technical staff with extensive experience since 2007.

3.title: Individual Approach
3.desc: Each project is implemented considering its specific features and conditions.

4.title: Safety Standards
4.desc: Strict compliance with occupational safety and technological requirements.

5.title: Reliability and Responsibility
5.desc: Full and precise fulfillment of obligations to the client.

6.title: Meeting Deadlines
6.desc: Projects are delivered strictly within the agreed timeframe.

project1.title: Construction of 220kV Double-Circuit Power Line from Navbahor TPS to Parvoz TPS (2024)
project1.descShort: Project for construction and installation of a 220kV double-circuit power line from Navbahor TPS to Parvoz TPS...
project1.descFull: This project, commissioned by JSC “O‘z qishloq elektr qurilish”, involves the construction and installation of a 220kV double-circuit power line from Navbahor TPS 220/27.5/10kV to Parvoz TPS 220/27.5/10kV. The project aims to ensure stable electricity supply in the region, and all necessary construction and installation works were completed. The project was successfully completed in 2024.

project2.title: Construction of 220kV Double-Circuit Power Line from Sarymay PS to Jayhun TPS (2024)
project2.descShort: Project for construction and installation of a 220kV double-circuit power line from Sarymay PS to Jayhun TPS...
project2.descFull: This project, commissioned by JSC “O‘z qishloq elektr qurilish”, involves the construction and installation of a 220kV double-circuit power line from Sarymay PS 220kV to Jayhun TPS 220/27.5/10kV. The project aims to ensure stable electricity supply in the region, and all necessary construction and installation works were completed. The project was successfully completed in 2024.

project3.title: Construction of 500kV Power Transmission Line Turakurgan Chodak (2014)
project3.descShort: Project for construction of a 500kV power transmission line Turakurgan Chodak...
project3.descFull: This project, commissioned by JSC “UZBEKENERGO”, involves the construction and installation of a 500kV power transmission line in Turakurgan Chodak. The project aims to ensure stable electricity supply in the region, and all necessary construction and installation works were completed. The project was successfully completed in 2014.

project4.title: Construction of 220kV Double-Circuit Power Transmission Line from Navbahor to Parvoz TPS (2024)
project4.descShort: Project for construction of a 220kV double-circuit power transmission line from Navbahor to Parvoz TPS...
project4.descFull: This project, commissioned by JSC “O‘z qishloq elektr qurilish”, involves the construction and installation of a 220kV double-circuit power transmission line from 220/27.5/10 kV Navbahor TPS to 220/27.5/10 kV Parvoz TPS. Modern support structures were installed, high-voltage transmission lines were laid, and all necessary construction and installation works were completed. The project aims to increase the stability of electricity supply and the transmission capacity and was successfully completed in 2024.

project5.title: Construction of Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at Surgil Field
project5.descShort: Project for the construction of the Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at the Surgil field...
project5.descFull: This project was implemented on behalf of UzKorGas Chemical for the construction and installation of the Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at the Surgil field. All necessary infrastructure and installation works were completed within the scope of construction. The project aims to increase the production capacity of the gas industry and ensure the full operational launch of the complex.

project6.title: Construction of Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at Surgil Field
project6.descShort: Project for the construction of Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at Surgil Field...
project6.descFull: This project was implemented on behalf of UzKorGas Chemical for the construction and installation of the Ustyurt Gas Chemical Complex at the Surgil field. All necessary infrastructure and installation works were completed within the construction scope. The project aims to increase the production capacity of the gas industry and bring the complex into full operation.

reviews.title: Our clients' feedback
reviews.subtitle: Clients who have worked with RSC highly appreciate the company's professional approach and quality work.

1.text: Special attention was paid to the quality of the construction processes. Work was completed on time, and we are satisfied with the result.
1.author: Abduqodirov Dilshod

2.text: The qualification of specialists and their approach to work is at a high level.
2.author: Qarshiyev Aziz

3.text: The company has shown itself as a reliable and responsible partner.
3.author: Tuxsinov Doniyorbek
